titles.title: A bill to extend the provisions of the Protect America Act of 2007 for an additional 30 days.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/22/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Protect America Act of 2007 (currently set to expire on February 1, 2008) to extend its authority for 30 days.
